original_text:
Will you be angry with us forever?
    Will you prolong your anger to all generations?
korean_text: 주께서 우리에게 영원히 노하시며 대대에 진노하시겠나이까

sentences.original_text: Will you be angry with us forever?
Will you prolong your anger to all generations?
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 진노를 모든 세대에까지 미치게 하시겠습니까?
